Detailed Description

Convenience class for implementing an editing action.

This class is provided for developers to easily implement an action that appears in the Main Menu in the 'Edit' submenu. Simply subclass DzEditAction, and implement the executeAction() method to perform the editing action, then add the class to the classes exported by your plug-in with DZ_PLUGIN_CLASS_FACTORY().

DzEditAction subclasses are automatically added to the main menu under 'Edit'.

See the A First Plug-in Action/Dialog sample sample for a simple example of using DzEditAction.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

const QString &  desc = QString::null 
) [protected]

Creates a new DzEditAction. To create a new edit action, you must subclass DzEditAction and implement the executeAction() function for the action.

Parameters:
text The menu text for this action.
desc The verbose description for this action.

QString DzEditAction::getDefaultMenuPath (  )  const [virtual]
Returns:
"&Edit" - By default, all DzEditAction subclasses are added to the 'Edit' menu in the main menu
